kata.name: FizzBuzz
kata.description: Code kata for determining FizzBuzz number.

text.p: Any number evenly divisible by 3 is replaced by "Fizz".
Any number evenly divisible by 5 is replaced by "Buzz".
Any number evenly divisible by both 3 and 5 is replaced by "FizzBuzz".
Determine the FizzBuzz number for a given positive integer.
